Title: Les menteurs
Actors: Jean-Hugues Anglade, Valeria Bruni Tedeschi, Lorraine Bracco, Sami Frey
Plot: Daisy uses 'All About Eve' tactics to lie her way into the circle of friends of director Zac. But Zac has been missing for months. When he finally resurfaces, he and Daisy start writing a script based on his experiences. But the story keeps changing.
